error.signature: React Hook useEffect has a missing dependency
error.regex: React Hook use\w+ has a missing dependency

verdict.summary: ESLint exhaustive-deps rule warning. Tricky — blindly adding deps can cause infinite loops.

dead_ends.why_fails: Hides real bugs — stale closures cause subtle issues
Can cause infinite re-render if dep is object/array created in render

workarounds.action: Memoize object/array deps with useMemo, or move them inside useEffect
Extract the function used in useEffect to useCallback if it's a dep

frequently_confused_with.distinction: 'React Hook useEffect has a missing dependency' is a hook_warning error while 'Warning' has a different failure mode despite similar symptoms. Check error message details to differentiate.
